name: Simple HTTP Server
postCreateCommand: echo 'from http.server import HTTPServer, BaseHTTPRequestHandler; class Handler(BaseHTTPRequestHandler): def do_GET(self): self.send_response(200); self.send_header("Content-type", "text/plain"); self.end_headers(); self.wfile.write(b"Hello from DevPod"); HTTPServer(("", 8080), Handler).serve_forever()' > /tmp/server.py
